## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G23100](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G23100)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>XRCC4</u>
- **Gene Name:** homolog of X-ray repair cross complementing 4
- **Description:**   DNA ligase IV-binding protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
